User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.8.0.8) Gecko/20061107 Fedora/1.5.0.8-1.fc6 Firefox/1.5.0.8
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.8.0.8) Gecko/20061107 Fedora/1.5.0.8-1.fc6 Firefox/1.5.0.8

The included link and some other pages cause the prowser to immediately crash with a SIGSEGV as soon as I attempt to visit. There is no sign of visual change in the browser other than the page loading icon in the upper right moving.

#40 0x0804aae1 in __cxa_pure_virtual ()


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
Simply visit the included link. I believe I can reproduce this on any Fedora 6 installation using the default repo package.

Actual Results:  
SIGSEGV

Expected Results:  
The page renders and all is right with the world
comments.creator: cjdahlin@ncsu.edu

comments.raw_text:
WFM, Firefox 1.5.0.8 on Linux (Kubuntu 6.10)

Reporter, does the official Mozilla.com build crash for you?
http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/products/download.html?product=firefox-1.5.0.8&os=linux&lang=en-US
comments.creator: mats@mozilla.com
comments.text:
WFM, Firefox 1.5.0.8 on Linux (Kubuntu 6.10)

Reporter, does the official Mozilla.com build crash for you?
http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/products/download.html?product=firefox-1.5.0.8&os=linux&lang=en-US
comments.author: mats@mozilla.com
cjdahlin@ncsu.edu
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> WFM, Firefox 1.5.0.8 on Linux (Kubuntu 6.10)
> 
> Reporter, does the official Mozilla.com build crash for you?
> http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/products/download.html?product=firefox-1.5.0.8&os=linux&lang=en-US
> 

I got the official build today, but the site started working for me too :( As I mentioned I've noticed similar crashes for other miscellaneous pages so its probably a page change (though it could still be unique to FC6 or my install). I know the site's author, so I'll try to get a backup of the old one for comparative purposes.
comments.text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> WFM, Firefox 1.5.0.8 on Linux (Kubuntu 6.10)
> 
> Reporter, does the official Mozilla.com build crash for you?
> http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/products/download.html?product=firefox-1.5.0.8&os=linux&lang=en-US
> 

I got the official build today, but the site started working for me too :( As I mentioned I've noticed similar crashes for other miscellaneous pages so its probably a page change (though it could still be unique to FC6 or my install). I know the site's author, so I'll try to get a backup of the old one for comparative purposes.
comments.creator: cjdahlin@ncsu.edu

comments.author: mats@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Please reopen the bug if you can make a Mozilla.com build crash, thanks.
comments.text: Please reopen the bug if you can make a Mozilla.com build crash, thanks.
